name: Spaghetti Code Anti-Pattern
description: Code that is difficult to follow due to poor structure and organization
when_to_use:
Code lacks proper structure or organization
Control flow is difficult to follow
Functions or methods are overly complex
drawbacks:
Hard to understand and maintain
Increases the likelihood of bugs
Makes code refactoring very difficult
Reduces development team productivity
use_cases:
Legacy codebases with poor initial design
Code written under extreme time pressure
Systems that have grown organically without planning
